Powerful Features for
Effortless Tracking

Everything you need to organize, track, and manage your warranties in one place

Core Feature

Smart Barcode Scanner

Point your camera at any UPC or QR code and we auto-fill product details, warranty info, and purchase data in seconds.

  • Works offline — syncs when you reconnect
  • Auto-fills product name, brand, and model
  • Supports UPC, QR, EAN, and Code 128

Core Feature

AI Receipt Scanning

Snap a photo of any receipt. Our AI reads the store, date, items, and warranty details — even from crumpled or faded paper.

  • AI-powered OCR text recognition
  • Works with faded, wrinkled, or low-contrast receipts
  • Originals stored securely in the cloud

Everything else you need

Built-in tools that make warranty management effortless

Smart Reminders

Push notifications weeks before warranties expire. Customizable timing for each item.

  • Push & email alerts
  • Priority alerts for high-value items

Multi-Device Sync

Access everything from phone, tablet, or desktop. Changes sync instantly with offline support.

  • iOS, Android & web
  • Offline mode with auto-sync

Bank-Level Security

AES-256 encryption protects your data. Automatic backups and version history included.

  • 256-bit AES encryption
  • Automatic daily backups

Flexible Exports

Export to PDF or CSV anytime. Great for insurance claims, moves, or sharing with family.

  • PDF reports with receipts
  • Batch export by category

All of this, starting at $0

Track up to 5 items free, forever. Need more? Premium is just $2/mo.
